content: The intention was to transition after today, but it looks like the call scheduler has been updated to change the call info effective today.  So we'll be using Zoom for today's FHIR Workflow and FHIR Infrastructure calls.  We'll also be using it for our Thursday SDC call.  This Zoom information will replace the GotoMeeting we've been using from this point forward.  Please update your calendars to use the following link: https://zoom.us/j/8583747934
What day is the Questionnaire call - can't find it on the HL7 call site ....
Thank- You. I will try to attend to get answers to my questions- I can't this week b/c I need to attend PC FHIR tracker call held at the same time.
Note that there will be a call today at 5 Eastern and a reminder to connect using Zoom (https://zoom.us/j/8583747934), not GotoMeeting
Is today's call going ahead? Lemme know if there's been a change to the weekly schedule. My apologies I wasn't able to join in the past 3 weeks
Sorry @Koray Atalag Today's call was cancelled. The notice goes out on the FHIR Infrastructure list serve, but I should have made a post here too. Apologies for not doing that.
